response.original_title: Blood Sacrifice - Occult Secrets of Hitler and the 3rd Reich
response.overview: At the height of his power, Adolph Hitler believed he was the Aryan Christ and the Biblical Antichrist. This documentary uncovers the Occult Secrets of Adolph Hitler and the 3rd Reich from a biblical perspective and presents research that mainstream historians generally fail to consider.
response.title: Blood Sacrifice - Occult Secrets of Hitler and the 3rd Reich
